messages.title: A BRIGHTER FUTURE FOR OUR MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES
URGENT CHANGE in mental health
messages.content: Four out of five people recognise mental health is as important as physical health, but only one out of five think the NHS treats it that way. The Liberal Democrats have long overlooked. The Liberal Democrats have an ambitious plan to decrease waiting times for mental health care and increase the staff training to provide better care.

messages.title: NHS UNDER THREAT WITH TRUMP AND JOHNSON
messages.content: If Boris Johnson remains as Prime Minister, things will only get worse for our NHS. Donald Trump has made it clear that the NHS would be part of negotiating any trade deals with the US.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats have an ambitious plan to decrease waiting times for mental health care and increase the staff training to provide better care.

issues.health: The Liberal Democrats have an ambitious plan to decrease waiting times for mental health care and increase the staff training to provide better care.

endorsements.endorsement: Poll reveals majority believe lying Boris Johnson will sell off NHS services to US.

quotes.text: Poll reveals majority believe lying Boris Johnson will sell off NHS services to US.
